DOC.brief_summary: It hypothesize procalcitonin role play prediction intra-amniotic subclinical infection .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Role Plasma Procalcitonin Prediction Intra-amniotic Infection Preterm Premature Rupture Membrane
DOC.detailed_description: Study population - This study conduct department Obstetrics Gynecology recruit pregnant woman select attendee antenatal clinic , emergency department inpatient ward Ain Shams University Maternity Hospital Mars2014 . - This study include 100 pregnant woman case divide 2 group : - Group 1 : Healthy preterm Group : include 50 pregnant female 24-34 week gestational age . - Group 2 : Preterm premature rupture membrane Group : include 50 pregnant female 24-34 week gestational age
DOC.criteria: Patients singleton pregnancy . Rupture membrane diagnose history , sterile speculum examination confirm fluid leakage cervical canal ultrasound confirm oligohydraminos . Subclinical infection detect laboratory index ( WBC count ≥15 , 000 c/mm3 , CRP ≥1 mg/dL ) without clinical symptom sign infection urinary tract infection group 1 patient . Women multiple pregnancy . Clinical sign infection ( fever , abdominal tendernes ) . Cervical dilatation 2 cm . Maternal disease like diabetes fetal complication like intrauterine fetal death .
